data.eml:eml: A new species of Microvelia (Insecta: Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Gerromorpha) from coastal Espírito Santo State, with a key to the species of the genus recorded from southeastern Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rúdio, Jéssika Ana, Moreira, Felipe Ferraz Figueiredo (2011): A new species of Microvelia (Insecta: Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Gerromorpha) from coastal Espírito Santo State, with a key to the species of the genus recorded from southeastern Brazil. Zootaxa 3004: 63-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.201560
